website_summaries.verdict: A mild, straightforward face wash that provides users who have dry or oily skin a clean, refreshed feeling.
pros: This reliable skin care brand is known for being super gentle on skin
It's a great, fragrance-free option for men looking for a simple daily cleanser that won't dry them out
cons: Does not work to prevent blackheads

customer_reviews.title: Long time user; Can be hard to locate in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this exact face wash from Nuetrogena for years. Im glad it has yet to be discontinued like most of my favorite products! This wash is of great quality: perfect for the in between shave days, its refreshing, and you can feel the nastiness of the day wash away. Added bonus is that your.. AMEM... “overnight guests” also dont mind using it. Only negative thing is that it sometimes overdries- like in the winter with the heat on and (for me) only around the eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Bju

customer_reviews.title: So-So Results for me
customer_reviews.text: I have what I consider to be "normal" skin and this product leaves my face a bit greasy. My face does feel clean but I don't like the greasy feel. I've used it over a period of a month and through the end of Winter and beginning of Spring with the same results. I was hoping for something with a better pH balance. I guess that I'll have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash.
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using it wrong actually at first where I would squeeze small amounts to different portions of my face and end up rubbing away. But I did felt refreshed anyways. Just started putting some in my hands and rubbing until it turns into a rich lather, and noticed the cooling effect increased 3X more than previously! The cooling effect not only makes my skin look refreshed but I also feel wide awake in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kentwood001

customer_reviews.title: This is a great facial cleanser for any teenager or man.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a deep cleaning cleanser which makes good for teenage boys and working men. Love the smell of the product. The pricing is unbeatable, for a high quality line of product. It does slightly tingle when applying the product but part of the reason my boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend because he was having issues with clogged pores, dry patches and rough texture from shaving & so far this wash has worked really well. It’s not drying at all & it smells really fresh and clean. I will definitely buy again when he’s done with this bottle, his skin is looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck skincare.
customer_reviews.text: You know for us guys its hard to take care of our skin whether we're lazy or just can't find the right product. Now this is reasonably priced and cleans my skin well. You don't have to use much. dime size or a little more and you're good. Scent is not over bearing and is suttle. I wouldn't say this is a end all be all product for you'r skin but for cleaning off oil and dirt its fantastic with a combination of moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: My go to face cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I found this product at Target. The best thing about this product is that it doesn't use the little plastic scrubbers that some products have. I believe those are harmful to the environment and sea life as they confuse it for food and then they die after eating the scrubbers. As for the cleaner it self, I tell you it will have your face feeling so fresh, so clean. I use it with every shower and every night before bed. Keeps my face feeling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: JungleG76

customer_reviews.title: Prevents oily skin but not much else
customer_reviews.text: This did not help with acne/blackhead removal but at $5 I wasn't really expecting that to happen. It does however do a great job of keeping my skin oil-free. My skin used to get very oily before using this but not anymore! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjan Shakya

customer_reviews.title: This face wash is one of the best out there IMO
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is one of the best out there IMO. I have an oily face type and this face wash keeps it nice and clean for most of the day. I use it once in the morning and once at night. You only have to use a little bit to cover the entire face. It leaves you with a cool, crisp, clean feeling after washing it off. For the price you pay I have not found a better mens facewash.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this was pretty good provided I didn't use it daily. Dried out my skin a bit too much if used every day but I don't think you really should use something like this that often.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say about something that doesn't do a whole lot?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's working on my husbands skin/face. He's still using it, but no major effects.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bohls

customer_reviews.title: My wife makes fun of me lol
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes fun of me because I bought such "cheap face wash" but this stuff is awesome. My face feels so refreshed with a cooling sensation. I feel like I'm a superhero
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Removes oils and dirt from faces very well.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, smells good. What else do you need? Seriously, your face will feel very clean after using this.
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: Clean as clean can ne
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser for a nana face. Cleans deep into pores, and making them less visible. You will want to Follow up with a moisturizer. I prefer l'oreal Men's Firming Lift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. I took a long time to finish this product. My skin burns a little bit with this product.
customer_reviews.author: suraj pandey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gentlemen's Spa Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the fresh, clean manly smell, and he raved about how soft and clean his face has been lately. We love that it leaves our face with a spa-like feel and for the price that says a lot! My husband has had numerous facials all across Atlanta and he ranks this face wash among products purchased from those high-end spas. This product is indeed "invigorating" and we will definitely be longtime customers.
customer_reviews.author: Tenia King

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out first day and burned my face the whole next say. It did Clean well. I would recommend using for someone who doesn't have sensitive skin. It was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Dj

customer_reviews.title: My face is tingle for about an hour afterwards because ...
customer_reviews.text: My face is tingle for about an hour afterwards because of the invigorating part. I will just stick with the neutrogena deep clean from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: great eye opener
customer_reviews.text: bought this face wash and another top brand great one two combo will purchase again definitely recomend
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Invigorating feel, but maybe a bit too much so for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Potter

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. My face feels clean. It gives that hand sanitizer feel for a few minutes. Item is probably cheaper elswhere.
customer_reviews.author: Orande Daring

customer_reviews.title: Average drug store product
customer_reviews.text: Meh... Competent but lacking. It will clean your face but dry it out at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father a few weeks ago and it’s been a decent face wash for him. Even as an older man he has issues with acne and he has been looking for something for some time now to help with it. So I saw this and decided to order it. While the smell is not my favorite, it does the job and my dad’s acne has cleared up some.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Q.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: After you use this, you know your face is clean. As others mentioned it does dry your face out. I didn't find it severe. Leaving your face dry and clean makes it well prepped for facial lotion or moisturizer. Has a more pleasant fragrance than many.
customer_reviews.author: FEFORD427

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin breakout.
customer_reviews.text: My face feels cleaner, but it makes me breakout and I never breakout. I even tried scrubbing it completely off, still brokeout.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Got foe bf but used it also
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend. I ended up using it also. I like the cool feeling that it leaves my skin
customer_reviews.author: Van Lam

customer_reviews.title: I mix it with my face scrub because I love to feel that tingling sensation
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks the feel of the tingling sensation but he's not sure if it actually helps. I mix it with my face scrub because I love to feel that tingling sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna DaBreo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality, good experiences. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so you need only use a very small amount each time and seems to work pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is more expensive than other brands, but it's worth it. The face wash is thick, so you need only use a very small amount each time and seems to work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you get dry skin easy then stay away from this product. definitely dries out the face.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R

customer_reviews.title: ... clean all your face oil and leave you that amazing mint cool feeling
customer_reviews.text: This truly can clean all your face oil and leave you that amazing mint cool feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried dozens of face washes and this one is in my top 3. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: I really like the face wash and feel the price is fair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash now for close to a year or two! I really like the face wash and feel the price is fair. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cleans squeaky clean and smells great with no heavy scent left after use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner. I use it every day. Cleans squeaky clean and smells great with no heavy scent left after use. Thanks ... Ken
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works great and does not dry out my face
customer_reviews.author: Justin Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for long time. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Hsakarp

customer_reviews.title: A mans face cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Very soothing on your face; like aftershave. An excellent cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jericiau

customer_reviews.title: WHY I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.text: WHAT IT IS: An oil-free facial cleanser for men WHAT IT DOES: Deep cleans without stripping moisture, and minimizes pores KEY INGREDIENTS: Glycerin (moisturizer); sodium lauryl sulfate and coco-glucoside (cleansers), menthol (skin tightener) HOW IT FEELS/SMELLS/LOOKS: The translucent blue gel produces a lasting cooling effect and has an energizing, cologne-like scent that's clean and masculine. WHY I LIKE IT: It's simple but effective. The clarifying formula gets skin squeaky clean and cuts oiliness, but doesn't leave you feeling stripped or tight—a notable plus for a guy who doesn't stock his medicine cabinet with face moisturizer. The cooling effect is, just as the name suggests, quite bracing, making this the perfect peppy cleanser for morning use.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: the best for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Get this. I have moderately oil skin and using this morning and night has stopped all but the occasional zit. Nothing else works as well. Better than anything else I've tried after trying several face washes.
customer_reviews.author: Lorax

customer_reviews.title: Product seems like returned and sent to me like that. Has missing content!!
customer_reviews.text: Missing content! This product seems like it has been used. Probably returned and sent to me like that!
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This smell good. This leaves a nice
customer_reviews.text: This cleans. This smell good. This leaves a nice, subtle tingle from the menthol. This won't fetch you a beer, or shave your face for you.
customer_reviews.author: NVSparky

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well
customer_reviews.text: I use this about once or twice a week only because it feels like I'm getting a real treat for my face. I will wash my face and leave the cleanser on my face for a minute or so to get the full effect of that cool menthol feel.
customer_reviews.author: TDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This cleans really well and it smells great! My husband is very picky about the products he will use because he has sensitive skin and he loves this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Naujock

customer_reviews.title: but keep buying more because its cooling effect makes me feel great hopping out of the shower
customer_reviews.text: Wakes you up. I'm guessing my face is cleaner, but keep buying more because its cooling effect makes me feel great hopping out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use on Bald Head
customer_reviews.text: Great not only for face, but if you shave your head, it prepares teh stubble adn ksin nicely. Too bad Amazon took it off the Subscription List - Now I'll go back to Target to get it because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to work into a lather. Still a good face wash
customer_reviews.text: I like this face wash and it has kept my face clear and kept my skin looking healthy, however, i'v always been annoyed at how hard it is to work up into a lather with a lot of the gel slipping through my fingers and just being wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a soothing sensation afterwords which is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps clean my face, I'm 29, male and suffer from oily skin. Leaves a soothing sensation afterwords which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash
customer_reviews.text: Tingly face wash helps to open up pores and remove dirt. The menthol oil was nice and awakening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only face wash I ever use
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash for my skin - does not dry skin, yet if feel clean and fresh. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hash

customer_reviews.title: Best facewash I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash I've ever used. I really like the invigorating factor of it as well. Face felt much better after using this product. Only complaint is it's a little pricey compared to other face-washes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cheap! I was wasting money on other high end cleansers. Will buy this one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Keep buying
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this for a long period and somehow stopped and i am glad to be back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 7 months and it makes my face feel very clean
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've got fairly oily, yet sensitive skin, and this stuff is great. It feels refreshing, but doesn't dry my skin out. It's pleasant enough to use that I actually do so every day.
customer_reviews.author: EssayistPA

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he seems to like it. I paired it with a few other Neutrogena items for Men and a travel bag. He was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: My go-to face wash
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing face wash. Doesn't dry my face out like most facial washes. Price is right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hedge II

customer_reviews.title: Need more!
customer_reviews.text: I rally needed to get some personal care in my skin and this has been one of the best items I've used so far...get it and you'll be satisfied with the results.

customer_reviews.title: rating
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very quick shipment. Face wash very refreshing and good cleaner. I do recommend product for a refreshing feeling.

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face wash. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day. I would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: solid and clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many products from.the expensive to cheap and this is one of the best for under 10 dollars smells great and doesn't leave film.

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean my face without over drying. Feels refreshing and smells good. I recommend it as a low cost alternative
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Minty! Oil fighter! Smells manly!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job fine. Great smell. Freshens up the skin in the morning. Best face wash I've used yet. I have oily skin and this helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Men Invigorating Face Wash, 5.1 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of it. Good to use it during the summer because it cools your face. I don't think i would use it during winter.
customer_reviews.author: eightGrand

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Men Invigorating Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he really likes the product. He has and will continue to use and recommends to his friends. He has been using this product for about one year. I like convenience of shopping through Amazon on line.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Fraga Lopez

customer_reviews.title: SO invigorating. I feel like a kid again. Only, a kid with debt.
customer_reviews.text: Totes invigorating. I feel 15 again every time I use this. Minus the acne.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to cleanse your face
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the job. Face feels cleaned after washing it with it. It's recommended for men because of the smell
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning your face. Easy and fast to use. I suggest using a wash cloth with this but make sure the wash cloth/hand towel is for your face only

customer_reviews.title: Nice face wash, love it!
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and cleans my face thoroughly. After using it, my face is really oil-free and having no dry feeling. It is thick and a very small dollop will do the job. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I've been using it for years now, it gives your face that fresh clean feel after you use it. I can't do without it in my daily arsenal!

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face feeling fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, leaves your face feeling fresh. Very soft no grits to scratch your face. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice face wash. You can feel your skin tingle and then it does seem to open up the pores. Bought several more tubes.

customer_reviews.title: The name is Invigorating!
customer_reviews.text: You'll definitely feel the cool invigoration as soon as this cleansing solution hits your face! It does a great job of keeping your skin clean, even down deep! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: i adore this face soap!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dad brought this and I happened to see it in the bathroom. I read what it does and smelled it. I wanted to know if would do any good for my face so I tried it. I feel in love instantly! Doesn't dry my face out and throughly cleans my pores. Yes it smells like a guys cologne but it's okay my face is clean. I had to hurry and buy my own because my daddy was tired of me sneaking into his lol :)
customer_reviews.author: Kiara M. Blake

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This product does it's name justice and leaves your face feeling oil-free. The pores on my face seem to shrink after they are scrubbed with that minty fresh feeling afterwards.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that leaves your face feeling clean an not oily

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not great
customer_reviews.text: PROS The product has a really nice tingling feel to it when it's on your face. The bottle is easy to use. It doesn't dry out your face. The scent is good and not overpowering. CONS I get the occasional pimple, and this didn't seem to reduce the frequency at which they occurred. If not for the last con, I would give the product 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: helps clean face a lot
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my face deeply, and I can feel the oil limited. It can create a layer to keep further clean.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it does its work as a face wash, and it's cheap.

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my face clear and wakes me up in the morning. Been using it for years!

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Smells nice and lathers well, leaves skin feeling and looking healthy and clean. Would recommend to anyone, and will definitely purchase it again!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that this is pretty much the only face wash that doesn't make my face ashy and it works well! I love the scent and you can really feel it working with the cool sensation it leaves on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: The menthol makes your face feel cool, fresh, and clean. However, this product isn't an acne product, dirt doesn't cause acne. I wouldn't recommend using this product with an acne wash as well, using in combination severely dried out my face. If you have mild to no acne, this is a great product for a clean face! If you have acne, use strong benzyl peroxide (5-10%). For others salicylic acid may work.
customer_reviews.author: YoungLo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good, my acne isn't going away but it definitely tones it down.

customer_reviews.title: I very like the scent of this face wash
customer_reviews.text: I very like the scent of this face wash, it's very manly and cleans the face without over drying
customer_reviews.author: Gian Luigi Bertoncini

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is indeed "invigorating"
customer_reviews.text: The wash has a very smooth texture, and it does the job pretty well. I find that in order for the face wash to have the "invigorating" effect, I have to rub it on my face a few times and let it sit for around 10 seconds. Add a splash of cold water and I'm wide awake!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cooling
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy how cool and refreshed my face feels after using this. However, I would really love it if it came as a scrub too.
customer_reviews.author: Heide

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for me
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for me, but it was extremely harsh on my brother's skin, and it caused him to develop rashes. The smell does wake you up, but it's a bit gimicky to make it more of a "men's product."
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Men Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is that this face wash does work, and it feels great on the face. Only slight defect is that it can't come too close to your eyes, but not a big enough deal where that would stop you from buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Trefzger

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash with menthol & without drying
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product & similar products from Nivea, Neutrogena, & Dove. This is among my favorites. I use in the shower every morning & I like the tingle of the menthol. It cleans without overdrying and leaves my skin ready for a wet shave once I get out. For the few bucks this costs it's worth a try - you may like it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing and cool.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this face wash for a couple of years now. Very refreshing and cool.
customer_reviews.author: NITESH BARANWAL

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I found the scent to be a bit too strong. It also burns more than normal soap if you get it in your eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Half of it came out need to wrap it better, other than that it smell n feels good

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice smell and good feel to it. All that I have left to say is it works great and I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: matt7

customer_reviews.title: Take care of that beautiful face.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Neutrogena products. You can feel the cool tingle on your face when using. Deep cleans and rinses off leaving no residue. You know your face is clean after using this wash. Gentle and won't dry your skin. I have sensitive skin and react negatively to many products, but not to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Men’s Invigorating Daily Foaming Gel Face Wash, Energizing & Refreshing Oil-Free Facial Cleanser for Men, 5.1 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Style Name:InvigoratingClean deeply and help awaken your senses with Neutrogena Men Invigorating Daily Face Wash. Designed specifically for men, this foaming gel cleanser forms a cooling lather to help cleanse your skin of excess surface oil and dirt and to refresh without over-drying it. The foaming gel formula is shown to clean deep down to pores and helps improve your skin’s overall look. This energizing face wash for men is oil-free and won’t clog pores.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: 5.1-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Men’s Invigorating Daily Foaming Gel Face Wash to help refresh and cleanse skin
Clinically proven by dermatologists to clean deep down to the pores without over-drying your skin. Designed specifically for a man’s face to help improve the overall look of skin
Help awaken your senses with the cooling lather of this invigorating face wash that helps cleanse your skin while providing a refreshing clean feeling
Energizing foaming cleanser helps remove excess oil and dirt from your skin with an oil-free formula that won’t clog your pores
Safe for daily use. For best results, apply a dime size amount of the foaming gel cleanser to wet hands and gently massage into lather with water
